name: SCRAMBLE (itch) (J&B Software 84)
description:
Clone of the old Scramble from the arcade, fun and challenging is a skill game, where your spaceship can fire horizontal missiles and bombs vertically.

Hitting the bases that carry the Word Fuel in order to finish the journey, watch out for the missiles that come from below.

Use:
Cursor keys to move UP/DOWN and LEFT/RIGHT
X = button to throw bombs that will drop down
Z = key to make horizontal focus
Esc = key to exit the game.

I created this game in June 2008 in 11 hours with the visual basic 5.

Have fun.
